name: <CARTO_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_NAME>
hint: The name of the service account that has necessary permission to run carto-template. eg: carto-sa, the one you created during clustertemplates configurations process

name: <CARTO_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_NAMESPACE>
hint: Namespace name that the service account is in.

name: <DELIVERY_SELECTORS>
hint:
The selector that will also appear in deliverable.yaml based on which Cartographer will trigger the appropriate delivery-chain.
eg: app.tanzu.vmware.com/workload-type: deliver

name: <SOURCE_TEMPLATE_NAME>
hint:
ResourceName: source-provider.
The name of the ClusterSourceTemplate that is responsible for defining how to get the git-ops deliverable config (using GitRepository from FluxCD in this case). eg: gitops-source

name: <DEPLOYMENT_TEMPLATE_NAME>
hint:
ResourceName: deployer.
The name of the ClusterDeploymentTemplate that is responsible for defining the deployment process of the git-ops deliverable. eg: app-deploy.

name: <SOURCE_SCANNER_DEPENDENCY_RESOURCE_NAME>
hint:
The ResourceName on which this resource (source-scanne) is dependant on.
Pick the appropriate one from the available list.
For Example:
	- source-provider: start scanning after source pull from git (eg: prod or stagin supply-chain)
	- source-tester: start scanning after source is tested (eg: dev, iteration or uat supply-chain)

name: <IMAGE_TEMPLATE_NAME>
hint:
${yellowcolor}ResourceName: image-builder.${normalcolor}
The name of the ClusterImageTemplate that is responsible for defining image creation process. eg: kpackimage.

name: <IMAGE_BUILDER_DEPENDENCY_RESOURCE_NAME>
hint:
The ResourceName on which this resource (image-builder) is dependant on.
Pick the appropriate one from the available list.
For Example:
	- source-provider: start image build after source pull from git (eg: dev supply-chain)
	- source-tester: start image build after source is tested (eg: dev or iteration or uat supply-chain)
	- source-scanner: start image build after source scan finishes (eg: stagin or prod supply-chain)

name: <IMAGE_SCANNER_TEMPLATE_NAME>
hint:
${yellowcolor}ResourceName: image-scanner.${normalcolor}
The name of the ClusterImageTemplate that is responsible for defining image scanning process. eg: imgscanner.

name: <CONFIG_TEMPLATE_NAME>
hint:
${yellowcolor}ResourceName: config-provider.${normalcolor}
The name of the ClusterConfigTemplate that is responsible for generating config/deployable file for git-ops. eg: app-config.

name: <CONFIG_PROVIDER_DEPENDENCY_RESOURCE_NAME>
hint:
The ResourceName on which this resource (config-builder) is dependant on.
Pick the appropriate one from the available list.
For Example:
	- image-builder: start config generation image is built (eg: dev, uat supply-chain)
	- image-scanner: start config generation after image scan (eg: uat, stagin or prod or uat supply-chain)

name: <GIT_WRITER_TEMPLATE_NAME>
hint:
${yellowcolor}ResourceName: git-writer.${normalcolor}
The name of the ClusterTemplate that is responsible for writting config/deployable to git repo for git-ops. eg: git-writer.
